珪字的基本解释

珪
guī
同“圭”①。

珪字的汉语字典释义

[①]［guī］
［《廣韻》古攜切，平齊，見。］
(1)“圭”的古字。瑞玉。常作祭祀、朝聘之用。
(2)古代封爵授土时，赐珪以为信，后因以代指官位。

珪字的康熙字典解释

【午集上】【玉字部】　珪； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页731第15
【玉篇】古文圭字。註詳土部三畫。

Gui
guī

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［guī］
["Guangyun" ancient carrying cut, flat, see. ]
(1) The ancient word "Guy". Ruiyu. Often used for sacrificial rites and court appointments.
(2) In ancient times, when granting land to noble titles, Cigui was believed to be a believer, and later used to refer to official positions.
